column4: BRIEF-Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd. Announces Changes To Board Of Directors
column5: May 15 (Reuters) - Xinyuan Real Estate Co Ltd:
column6: * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO., LTD. ANNOUNCES CHANGES TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
column7: * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO LTD - BOARD WELCOMES APPOINTMENTS OF SAMUEL SHEN AND HAO GAO AS INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS
column8: * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO LTD - HUAI CHEN AND STEVE SUN WILL RESIGN AS DIRECTORS OF BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
